item.title: By: RaeC
item.dc:creator: RaeC
item.description: Can I just add that a slurp of honey to the mix makes this even more AMAZING... great recipe... thanks for posting!!
item.content:encoded: Can I just add that a slurp of honey to the mix makes this even more AMAZING… great recipe… thanks for posting!!

item.title: By: Chanel11
item.dc:creator: Chanel11
item.description: Oh dear, you've got me thinking about breaking my alcohol ban...
item.content:encoded: Oh dear, you’ve got me thinking about breaking my alcohol ban…

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Anita - I dont drink but toblerone cocktail is the only thing I will make an exception for!
item.content:encoded: Anita – I dont drink but toblerone cocktail is the only thing I will make an exception for!

item.title: By: Parita

item.description: WOW!!! That looks divine Anita!!!! Love the swirls!!
item.content:encoded: WOW!!! That looks divine Anita!!!! Love the swirls!!

item.title: By: Rilsta

item.description: Hehe, it matches your top! The swirls look so nice and the drink sounds delicious!
item.content:encoded: Hehe, it matches your top! The swirls look so nice and the drink sounds delicious!

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Mmmm I love the Toblerone ^^! SO worth making in this heat!
item.content:encoded: Mmmm I love the Toblerone ^^! SO worth making in this heat!

item.title: By: Ellie
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description: I like your matching stripey top with your toblerone cocktail. Love chocolate based cocktails. It tastes heavenly.
item.content:encoded: I like your matching stripey top with your toblerone cocktail. Love chocolate based cocktails. It tastes heavenly.

item.title: By: sophia
item.dc:creator: sophia
item.description: ohmigosh. This is the ultimate creation. Toblerone is one of my favorite chocolates. Turn that into an ultra creamy drink, PLUS shot of alcohol...Whoa, mama!
item.content:encoded: ohmigosh. This is the ultimate creation. Toblerone is one of my favorite chocolates. Turn that into an ultra creamy drink, PLUS shot of alcohol…Whoa, mama!

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: Sounds delicious. This is a great holiday cocktail idea-- and a great way to spice up dessert!
item.content:encoded: Sounds delicious. This is a great holiday cocktail idea– and a great way to spice up dessert!

item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: oh heavens. i, too, enjoy alcoholic beverages more when no alcohol can be detected and this would be a quick way to get me snockered. it's beautiful and completely appealing!
item.content:encoded: oh heavens. i, too, enjoy alcoholic beverages more when no alcohol can be detected and this would be a quick way to get me snockered. it’s beautiful and completely appealing!
